input.problem_summary: Consumers currently face a dilemma in quick-serve restaurants: either choose affordable, questionable meat-based options or expensive, healthier alternatives. There is a lack of affordable access to plant-based foods for all Americans.
input.solution_summary: Project Poyo is America's first vegan chicken fast-food chain, offering real delicious food made from real plants. Their menu includes a hand-breaded crispy chicken patty made from 100% soy, along with burgers, wraps, salads, shakes, and Buffalo mac and cheese. Their mission is to provide affordable plant-based options to everyone, regardless of income.

facts:
Company: Project Pollo
Founders: Founder 1
Investment Offer: 2.5 million dollars for 5%

PROBLEM:
Consumers currently face a dilemma in quick-serve restaurants: either choose affordable, questionable meat-based options or expensive, healthier alternatives. There is a lack of affordable access to plant-based foods for all Americans.

SOLUTION:
Project Poyo is America's first vegan chicken fast-food chain, offering real delicious food made from real plants. Their menu includes a hand-breaded crispy chicken patty made from 100% soy, along with burgers, wraps, salads, shakes, and Buffalo mac and cheese. Their mission is to provide affordable plant-based options to everyone, regardless of income.
ground_truth_pitch: hi my name is Lucas Bradbury founder and CEO of project Poyo America's first vegan chicken fast food chain sharks I'm here to protest we demand change and when it comes to Quick Serve restaurants there's only two options available one something that's affordable made from very questionable meat-based product or two something that costs a wing and a leg that's on the healthier side and As Americans we all deserve affordable access to plant-based foods and that's why we created project Poyo real delicious food made from real plants now our original project is a hand breaded crispy chicken patty that's made from 100 soy and it's truly to die for but no animals had to die for it to be this good now we didn't just stop there we also have Burgers wraps salads shakes and oh yeah my personal favorite Buffalo mac and cheese and take a look at that and sharks our mission was simple we wanted everyone regardless of their income to be able to afford these options after all the future of mass consumption is plant-based now sharks it's time that we demand better it's time that we free the chickens it's time that we start putting people over the profits and start doing Poyo with the purpose and that's why I'm here today embrace yourself sharks seeking 2.5 million dollars in exchange for five percent of my company
generated_pitch:
"Good evening Sharks, my name is Founder 1 and I'm here to present Project Pollo, America's first vegan chicken fast-food chain. As we all know, the quick-serve restaurant industry is a massive market, but it's also a market that's been lacking in options for health-conscious consumers who don't want to break the bank. That's why we're on a mission to make plant-based food accessible to everyone, regardless of income.

The problem is clear: consumers are forced to choose between affordable, questionable meat-based options or expensive, healthier alternatives. But what if I told you there's a third option? At Project Pollo, we're serving up real, delicious food made from real plants. Our menu features a hand-breaded crispy chicken patty made from 100% soy, along with burgers, wraps, salads, shakes, and even Buffalo mac and cheese.

We believe that everyone deserves access to healthy, sustainable food, and we're committed to making that a reality. Our prices are competitive with traditional fast food chains, but our food is made with ingredients that are better for you and the planet.

We're looking for a $2.5 million investment in exchange for 5% equity. The funds will be used to expand our operations, open new locations, and continue to innovate and improve our menu. We believe that with the right partner, we can take Project Pollo to the next level and make a real impact on the food industry.

So, Sharks, are you ready to join the plant-based revolution and make a investment that's not only good for your wallet, but also good for the planet?"

assessment.reasoning: All required facts are present and correct, giving a perfect factual score. The narrative follows a clear problem‑solution‑ask flow but lacks emotional impact, resulting in a 0.7 score. The tone is professional yet generic, not sufficiently persuasive for a Shark Tank setting, leading to a 0.5 style score.

input.problem_summary: Women experience significant pain and discomfort after wearing high heels for a short period, leading to regret over their shoe choice.
input.solution_summary: Passion Footwear has invented the world's first fully convertible high heels that can transform into comfortable flats with a simple twist, eliminating high-heel pain and discomfort.

facts:
Company: Pashion Footwear
Founders: Founder 1
Investment Offer: 500,000 for 5%

PROBLEM:
Women experience significant pain and discomfort after wearing high heels for a short period, leading to regret over their shoe choice.

SOLUTION:
Passion Footwear has invented the world's first fully convertible high heels that can transform into comfortable flats with a simple twist, eliminating high-heel pain and discomfort.
ground_truth_pitch: Hi Sharks, My name is Haley Pavoni, and I'm from San Luis Obispo, California. Today, I'm seeking a $500,000 investment in exchange for 5% of my game-changing company, Passion Footwear. It's a tale as old as time. A woman puts on her favorite pair of heels and heads out — to work, to a wedding, or a night on the town. She looks absolutely stunning, crushing her commute, tearing up the dance floor, and looking her absolute best… for exactly 45 minutes. Then suddenly, her feet are on fire, and she regrets everything about her shoe choice.So, I invented the ultimate solution to high-heel pain and discomfort — the world's first fully convertible high heels. Not that I don't completely rock this outfit, but let me just slip into something a little more comfortable. With a quick twist of the wrist, our stylish high heels transform into comfortable, practical flats — just like that. Want to see me do it again? Impressive, right? It's so much more comfortable. Here at Passion, we're determined to make traditional high heels — and all the ridiculous problems that come with them — a thing of the past. So, Sharks, who's ready to take on the massive women's shoe market and join us in the next step of this journey into amazing convertible heels?
generated_pitch:
"Good evening Sharks, my name is Founder 1 and I'm here to present Pashion Footwear, a company that's revolutionizing the way women wear high heels. We've all seen it - women struggling to walk in their high heels, wincing in pain after just a few hours. The reality is, high heels can be brutal, and many women regret their shoe choice by the end of the night. But what if I told you there's a solution that can eliminate high-heel pain and discomfort altogether? 

At Pashion Footwear, we've invented the world's first fully convertible high heels that can transform into comfortable flats with a simple twist. Our shoes are designed to be stylish, comfortable, and versatile, allowing women to wear them all day without sacrificing fashion for comfort. We believe our product has the potential to disrupt the $40 billion footwear industry and capture a significant share of the market.

We're looking for a $500,000 investment in exchange for 5% equity. The funds will be used to scale our production, expand our marketing efforts, and build a strong online presence. We believe that with the right partner, we can take Pashion Footwear to the next level and make it a household name. So, Sharks, are you ready to join the revolution and help us change the way women wear high heels?"

assessment.reasoning: All required facts are present and accurate, giving a perfect factual score. The narrative follows a clear structure but lacks the emotional storytelling and vivid details of the gold‑standard pitch, resulting in a 0.7. The style is professional but generic and not especially persuasive, meriting a 0.5.
